title: Agh I didn't know you had to get bundle for the border only! could I please get a refund?
body: Ughhh I didn't know this at all! it seems very sneaky but after seeing that only buying the skins does not give you the border. I was wondering if you could be so gracious enough in offering me a 1 more refund...I bought two star guardian skins thinking I would get borders for both...but clearly I was misinformed about you needing to buy the first edition as well. I don't have enough money to spend on the first editions for both and not even one and I really wanted that border. My family is really clutch on money right now because of the recent hurricane and I just wanted to play my OneTrick Miss Fortune with a great border with her...
